statements: UPDATE user_login_activity SET login_location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE user_login_activity SET login_success = TRUE, login_time = '2022-03-15 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 102
UPDATE user_login_activity SET login_location = 'New York', login_success = true WHERE user_id = 123 AND login_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE user_login_activity SET login_time = '2022-02-15 10:30:00', login_location = 'Los Angeles' WHERE login_success = false;
UPDATE user_login_activity SET user_name = 'Alice', login_ip = '192.168.1.100' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE login_attempts SET success = true, attempt_time = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE attempt_id = 456;
UPDATE user_login_activity SET user_name = 'Alice', login_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, login_ip = '192.168.1.100' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE login_attempts SET success = true, attempt_time = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', user_id = 456 WHERE attempt_id = 789;
UPDATE UserLoginActivity SET login_time = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', login_success = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE UserDevice SET last_used = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, device_name = 'New Device' WHERE device_id = 456;
UPDATE UserLoginActivity SET login_time = '2022-06-30 08:00:00', login_success = true WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserDevice SET last_used = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, device_name = 'Mobile Device' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_login_activity SET login_success = true WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE login_attempts SET attempt_success = false, attempt_ip = '192.168.1.10' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_login_activity SET login_ip = '192.168.1.100', login_success = true WHERE user_id = 123 AND username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE login_attempts SET attempt_success = true, attempt_timestamp = '2022-01-15 13:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND attempt_ip = '10.0.0.1';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE device_info SET last_login=NOW() WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE login_sessions SET logout_time = '2022-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE session_id = 456
